original_text: While Paul was waiting for them in Athens, he was greatly distressed to see that the city was full of idols.
korean_text: 바울이 아덴에서 그들을 기다리다가 그 성에 우상이 가득한 것을 보고 마음에 격분하여

sentences.original_text: While Paul was waiting for them in Athens
to see that the city was full of idols
sentences.korean_translation: 그 도시가 우상으로 가득 차 있는 것을 보고서
